title: Posit Team Dedicated
text: Posit Team Dedicated is a Single-Tenant SaaS distribution. PTD offers an enterprise customer the governance and compliance story of self-hosted products, with the convenience of SaaS. The pricing is based on both licenses + management fee. PTD includes the full team suite (Workbench, Connect, Package Manager, Chronicle), configured to work together seamlessly. A customer can choose both their cloud and their region.

title: Posit Team Dedicated Security Checklist
text:
Security Checklist

SSO

Customer SSO is be provisioned using OIDC
Internal Access to backend resources for the maintenance and deployment use Posit Okta

Code Protections

Release branches require PRs to merge.
All applications in GitHub Org uses only approved GitHub Apps

Access to ptd repos are backed by Okta
CodeOwners is restricted to director level with 1 backup designate
Secret Scanning is present as PR Check

Posit Activity and Access Logging

Logging of Posit admin activity is sent to DataDog with documented RBAC
All audit logs from control room are sent to Customer SIEM

Physical Security

Infrastructure is provided by AWS and is protected by AWS physical security protections
Access to ptd:control room is be restricted to Posit workstations

IaC

Pulumi is used for all Infra and workspace deployments, also see code protections

Encryption

FIPS level encryption is required for data at rest and in transit.

Monitoring and Alerting

CloudTrail and GuardDuty alerts are sent to customer facing logging/alerting stack.


MDM

CrowdStrike is installed on all AWS Workspaces


Vendor Security

Initial list and updates to vendors used for service delivery is communicated to the customer.

Incident Response

Customer notification is required for all security incidents.

title: Posit Team Dedicated Security Checklist
text:
Conclusion
By following this compliance checklist, we can ensure that ptd:Control Room meets all the minimum necessary security compliance requirements.
